name: Super 123
description:
Super 123 is an Adventure-Platform-Horror-Comic-RPG-Arcade Game that takes place in YOUR computer !

Solve tuff puzzles by only pressing 1, 2, or 3 on your keyboard ! Super Puzzles, Super musics, Super characters,
and a Super gameplay who will be evolving as you encounter new characters and discover new worlds !

Meet strange characters, a flowWeir in a sok! A vampire Baroness! A mysterious masked man! And thousands of other characters forgotten in the meanders of your own computer! Aided by an Anti-Virus named Nathan, a dandelion and the game developers stuck in it, lift the veil on the mystery surrounding the arrival of glitches in your PC. Unique environments, funny characters and a dark atmosphere, you do not come away unscathed.
